html.description: Video clips and audio streams have a special place on the Twitter platform thanks to the Player Card. By implementing a few HTML meta tags to your website and following the Twitter Rules of the Road, you can delivery your rich media to users across the globe.
html.title: Player Card | Twitter Developers
